name: Washing Machine
description:
Mdm Shakila is a single mother, raising 3 children in her household. 

She is currently unemployed due to caregiving responsibilities as well as her multiple physical health concerns. 
Mdm Shakila's washing machine has broken down recently and is unable to afford a new washing machine. She has been washing her family's clothes and bedsheets manually, but her multiple physical ailments have made it difficult for her to do so. Her children has eczema so she is not able to cut down on her washing. 


As such, case worker would like to request for donations for a washing machine for the family. This would help Mdm Shakila with maintaining the cleanliness and hygiene of the home environment for her and her children. 

We request for the donor would have to bear the cost of moving as well. 
A washing machine with Top Open, 15kg, preferably with drying function.

name: Adjustable Bed Frame and mattress (Single)
description:
Mdm Tan is a 78-year-old elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), who was involved in a hit-and-run accident a few years back. Her head and lower limbs are currently supported by prosthesis. Mdm Tan’s son recently passed on, and she is unable to afford an adjustable bed.  

THKMC is looking for an Adjustable Bed Frame (Single) to replace Mdm Tan’s current bed frame as the middle portion is breaking. Mdm Tan has mobility challenges and an adjustable bed can ease her movements to getting up and down of bed independently.   

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Anthony at 9654 6542. The recipient is located at Ang Mo Kio Avenue 1.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

name: Pocket Talker
description:
Mr Neo is a 73-year-old elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC), who is residing alone in a 2-room rental flat. He has difficulty hearing and is only able to communicate through manual writing. 

THKMC is looking for a Pocket Talker to assist Mr Neo with his hearing. With the Pocket Talker, we hope that Mr Neo will be able to participate and enjoy the activities at THK Seniors Activity Centres with his peers more meaningfully. 

If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact Patrick Foo at 8778 8712. The recipient is located at Ang Mo Kio Avenue 3.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

THK Elderly Services Division provides many programmes and services to serve the elderly in need – one of which includes THK Cluster Support. THK Cluster Support provides social support through case management, monitoring, and basic counselling services to vulnerable seniors, and facilitates coordination in the provision of community-based care and support services to the seniors. This service aims to improve the quality of life of vulnerable seniors, particularly for low or no income seniors who are socially-isolated and have minimal or no family support.

Since October 2011, THKMC was incorporated as a charity with an IPC status to provide multiple social and welfare services to the community at large. THKMC provides assistance to the Elderly, Families, Children & Youth, and Persons with Disabilities, through more than 70 programmes and services.

name: Washing Machine
description: Client is a 53 year old who is living on his own in a rental flat. Client has multiple chronic diseases. His wife and son are in Thailand and unable to be with him in Singapore due to Covid. Client just moved into his rental flat and does not have a washing machine. It will help him a lot if he has a washing machine that can reduce his time of washing his clothes by hand and spend more time working and taking care of his health

name: HospiCare 40R Ultrasoft Adult Body Wipes
description:
Patient is a 38 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a three-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. Patient requires the use of wet wipes on a long-term and regular basis for patient's upkeeping and hygiene. On average, patient uses 1.5pack in a day. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing medical consumables due to husband’s unemployment. 

The item can be found on Rehab mart: https://rehabmart.com.sg/nursing/adult-diaper-incontinence-care/hygiene/freshening-hospicare-body-wipes-wt-hospicare-3 or PinkPharm: https://www.pinkpharm.com/products/hopsicare-adult-body-wipes .

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can contact Jia Ling at 82479135 via whatsapp or call for details. Thank you!

name: Milk and diaper
description: A low income family of 5 young children requires milk and diaper support. M size and XL size, pull-up diapers preferred. Friso milk, after 6 months and step 4 milk preferred as well. Appreciate donation! Thank you.

name: Washing Machine

name: One adult size motorized mobility scooter for handicap
description:
One authorized adult size mobility scooter for handicap that can be used in Singapore.  

The client met with a lorry accident that crushed his left leg and lost his right eye vision. He is currently in a homeless state and unemployment. He hopes to be blessed with an authorized mobility scooter for his daily movement and to do Grab food delivery. 

The specification requested by LAW / LTA: 
The e-scooter/PMD must have a:
Maximum width of 70 cm
Maximum weight of 20 kg; and
Maximum speed of 25 km/h
comply with the UL2272 fire safety standard.

name: Drypers Drypants L size and Nestle Lactogen milk powder
description: Low income family staying in rental flat in need of diapers and milk powder. Client is a teenage mother and is not working. Fiance is struggling to cope with financial demands. Family is currently using Drypers Drypantz L size and Nestle Lactogen (3).

name: Motorized Wheelchair
description: C is a elderly man, who lives alone. He had an amputation in late 2019 and have been commuting around with a donated motorized wheelchair. Unfortunately, due to a recent minor car accident, the wheelchair was hit and became faulty. C struggled to purchase a new one due to his financial limitation. As such, the call for donation for a motorized wheelchair.

name: Diapers (XL size)
description: Family has 3 young children (5,4,3). Youngest son needs 6 packets of XL-size diapers (tape-on) monthly, of childcare centre needs 4 pkts. Husband's income is insufficient to pay due to high household bills & accumulated outstanding bills. Needs help with diapers.

name: Laptop with Microsoft Office
description: Family of 9, with 7 children below 10 YO, have children who requires at least 1 laptop for their online session - Student Learning Space. The client's spouse is not able to work due to medical issues and the family lost a substantial amount of income. Family now depends on client's income as the sole breadwinner. The donation will greatly reduce the financial stress on the couple. Item donated can be sent directly to FSC.

name: Tena diapers (Size M, 8 dots)
description: Client suffers from Schizophrenia and is non communicative. Caregiver is having a hard time understanding his needs as he is unable to express himself. Recently, client is showing symptoms of urinary and bowel incontinence. Caregiver is struggling to have the financial means to pay for her brother's care needs in the long term. It would be great if donor can get 2 cartoons of tena diapers, size M with 8 dots. This will help alleviate her caregiver stress.
